main event: A bright light was spotted moving very fast over Benghazi, Libya on February 16, 1959 around 10:30 PM.
interesting points: The object was much higher than the witness, who was flying at 2,000 feet.
The object exhibited a 'silver-like color' and 'strange behavior', moving from slow to very fast speeds.
The witness was scared and reported the sighting to the base.
The object appeared round or oval in shape and was larger than an average light.
The object disappeared suddenly from view.
sighted object: a bright light moving at high speed
